name: Loop Bot
description:
Welcome to Bot Loop. This is a game I made for the Black and White Jam #8. 

This game is about moving a bot that is constantly looping in one direction. You're main goal is to get it to the full white door by moving objects around like springs, blocks and Direction Changers. 

I didn't get too much time to work on this Jam as I have been busy with Uni work. This is also my first jam so please bare that in mind since there is still a few bugs and I didn't manage to get any audio in.
